resources.string:
The recipes are for information purposes only and have no medical value.
 Always try to use the ingredients on a small portion of your skin and allow 24 hours to check for allergies.
 Make sure you clean your containers and ustensils before making your cosmetics. 
 Essential oils are to be diluted and are not suitable for pregnant or breastfeeding women. 
 It may take several tries to find the recipe that best suits your needs. Be patient !
